page.title: 03A day at Ipplepen School.
page.content: On a{Monday}I wake up at half past seven. I get dressed and go down stairs. I have a drink of pure orange juice then I get ready for school.{I {walk to school}and get there at nine o'clock.{School starts at ten past.}We go inside and do some maths and things like that. Then we have assembly in the hall.After we go back to class our teacher tells us we can go out to play. If we want, we can have a biscuit and a milkshake. Then we go out to play.{Playtime finishes}at quarter to eleven. I do language or finish other work before my group go swimming, then I read until mid-day. { At twelve o'clock we go to lunch.}I bring sandwiches to eat. When our table is called by the dinner lady we can go out to play again. We come in at ten past one to do project work.{We {go home at half past three.
